bibl.title: Catalogue of the Greek Inscriptions in the Sudan National Museum at Khartoum (I. Khartoum Greek). Photographs by Wlodzimierz GODLEWSKI. Preface by Hassan HISSEIN and Wlodzimierz GODLEWSKI.
bibl.note: Introduction. - Catalogue [Nos 1-83; viiie-xiie siècles, sauf les Nos 77-78, qui sont datables di iiie ou du ive siècle]. - Bibliography. Indices. Concordances.
bibl.seg: LAJTAR Adam, Catalogue of the Greek Inscriptions in the Sudan National Museum at Khartoum (I. Khartoum Greek). Photographs by Wlodzimierz GODLEWSKI. Preface by Hassan HISSEIN and Wlodzimierz GODLEWSKI. (Orientalia Lovaniensia Analecta. 122.)
Leuven - Paris - Dudley, MA, Peeters - Departement Oosterse Studies, 2003, 8°, xxviii-265 pp. et 80 pll. ISBN 90-429-1252-9. €95.
Introduction. - Catalogue [Nos 1-83; viiie-xiie siècles, sauf les Nos 77-78, qui sont datables di iiie ou du ive siècle]. - Bibliography. Indices. Concordances.

C.R. par Jean Bingen, ChrEg 79 (2004) Nos 157-158, pp. 390-391. - Thomas Hägg, BibO 62 (2005) coll. 273-276. - Arietta Papaconstantinou, JAC 47 (2004) pp. 207-209. - Youhanna Nessim Youssef, BSAC 45 (2006) pp. 226-227.
